message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item to you for $95. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. How about we meet halfway at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82.50. I'm really trying to get the best deal possible.
Bob, I appreciate your negotiation, but I can't go any lower than $87. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm afraid I need to stay within my budget of $80. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet that price. Can you reconsider?
